com.gv.cataloguer.catalog.dao

Interface ResourceDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ResourceDaoDatabase

    public interface ResourceDao
    This interface provides methods for accessing remote data storage with information about files

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addResourceToCategory(java.lang.String category, java.io.File file)
      inserts file to remote data storage and also saves it to local catalog according category
      void deleteResourceFromCategory(java.lang.String category, int id)
      deletes resource according id from remote catalog
      java.util.List<Reference> getAllResourcesFromCategory(java.lang.String category)
      retrieves all files from remote data storage and saves them to local catalog according category of files
      Reference getResourceFromCategory(java.lang.String category, int id)
      retrieves file from remote data storage and saves it to local catalog according category of files and id of file, that stored in remote data storage

    • Method Detail

      • getAllResourcesFromCategory

        java.util.List<Reference> getAllResourcesFromCategory(java.lang.String category)
        retrieves all files from remote data storage and saves them to local catalog according category of files
        Parameters:
        category - - name of category of files
        Returns:
        list of references on files in local catalog

      • getResourceFromCategory

        Reference getResourceFromCategory(java.lang.String category,
                                  int id)
        retrieves file from remote data storage and saves it to local catalog according category of files and id of file, that stored in remote data storage
        Parameters:
        category - - name of category of files
        id - - unique id of file in remote data storage
        Returns:
        reference on file in local catalog

      • addResourceToCategory

        void addResourceToCategory(java.lang.String category,
                           java.io.File file)
        inserts file to remote data storage and also saves it to local catalog according category
        Parameters:
        category - - name of category of files
        file - - resource that will be added to remote data storage

      • deleteResourceFromCategory

        void deleteResourceFromCategory(java.lang.String category,
                                int id)
        deletes resource according id from remote catalog
        Parameters:
        category - - name of category of files
        id - unique id of file in remote data storage
